nodes.text: Oren Ward was a Human male Mandalorian Jedi killer who was captured by Voontara Fa'athra and imprisoned in carbonite in Fa'athra's Palace on Nal Hutta during the Cold War. Ward's friend Burnok recruited help in rescuing Ward from the palace.
Oren Ward is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Kiff VandenHeuvel.
